stripped_text: Whenever a program is trashed from your grip, host it on BMI Buffer instead of adding it to your heap. click click: Install 1 hosted program, ignoring all costs.
text:
Whenever a program is trashed from your grip, host it on BMI Buffer instead of adding it to your heap.
[click][click]: Install 1 hosted program, ignoring all costs.
title: BMI Buffer 2
